steps: step 1: Navigate to *
step 2: Click on link growth calculator -> Navigate to page 'calculator page#*/growthcalculator'
step 3: Click on span dollarAmount (NominalDollars)
step 4: Click on input dollarAmount (NominalDollars2)
step 5: Click on link years -> Navigate to page 'investor education ditching debt#*/*/*'
step 6: Click on link get started
step 7: Click on input email
step 8: Enter input value in input email
step 9: Click on textbox first name
step 10: Enter input value in textbox first name
step 11: Click on textbox last name
step 12: Enter input value in textbox last name
step 13: Click on combobox preferred language
step 14: Select option with input value from combobox preferred language
step 15: Click on role radio
step 16: Click on combobox description
step 17: Select option with input value from combobox description
step 18: Click on button get the guide
step 19: Click on checkbox consent
step 20: Click on button get the guide
step 21: Click on link editorial card -> Navigate to page 'investor education save or invest#*/*/*'
step 22: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
